titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation concerning wine-licences.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker, printers to the King's most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehal, the nineteenth day of May, 1662. in the fourteenth year of our reign.".

Reproduction of original in the British Library.
